name: Snake N
description:
From tiny black-and-white screens to brick-like phones, the Snake game has seen many shapes and variations. Here it is again for the bigger screens, in a form inspired from the 3D version on the good old Nokia N Series phones.

Controls:

  • Touch screen: tap the left or right half of the screen to turn the snake
  • Keyboard: Use A and D keys to turn the snake
  • On a keyboard you can also briefly accelerate/slow the snake by pressing W or S

This game is currently very short. When I have more time I'll create longer and more interesting levels.
